channel.title: Capzuul - industry city sleepers [DnB / Jungle]
channel.description:
[![CAPZUUL|500x500](upload://4IZTBuFYSdgrW0RzgJK7d5YkSDA.jpg)](https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/capzuul)
(click pic)
Been brewing this one for a little bit. To be honest, I'm not 100% happy with the drums (programming yes, samples ehhhhh). But I fought and I fought and I fought with it and this is pretty much as good as I could get it.
I think the set I used had some extra filtering or reverb, I dunno....
Yes, the name is a play on the Ghostbusters demon :ghost: no there aren't any references to the film in the track. Thanks all!

item.title: Capzuul - industry city sleepers [DnB / Jungle]
item.dc:creator: Danbligity
item.description:
iammane:

Best piece of kit I ever owned was an Electribe EM-1, the older black one. Thing was great, wish I still had it.

Man, SOOOO MANY equipment sold for ALL the messed up (LIFE), wrong reasons, over the years. I feel ya on that!!

iammane:

all mixing is done A/Bing on Apple earbuds, my truck stereo and a nice pair of Sennheiser monitoring headphones.

Mixing board (fancy whatever!), or not, …I do the EXACT same thing!! And, …(They suck at bass, but the clarity is fantastic) ~~>>Old School Dynamic Sony MDR 7506(Not in my hand so might not be right, but close for sure!lol) Pro Studio Mon Headgear ($80 or so, Amaz). I was looking for new pads for em and saw they are going to discontinue them. NUTS!! but the fact they are a must have 40 yrs running, means something! Might wanna check em out (over the ear, btw). Those along with the Apple buds is a super combo IMO.

Nice chattin with ya bro!!

Read full topic

item.title: Capzuul - industry city sleepers [DnB / Jungle]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Nawp, all mixing is done A/Bing on Apple earbuds, my truck stereo and a nice pair of Sennheiser monitoring headphones.

I’ve never mixed in a hardware environment, various software only (GarageBand, Reason, FL Studio).

I agree though, physical gear is great, just having the tactile response is great. Best piece of kit I ever owned was an Electribe EM-1, the older black one. Thing was great, wish I still had it.

Read full topic

item.title: Capzuul - industry city sleepers [DnB / Jungle]
item.dc:creator: Danbligity
item.description:
Ofcourse, YW Mang! I know what ya mean though, …got that sample ya found and it’s THE ONE, yet it’s flawed. If I Love it so much I will use it anyways! lol … curious if you mixdown your tracks on a Mackie, etc. Board or not? If not, then if only relying on GB’s echo/reverb/compression (which I laugh at!) mastering, getting rid of extra reverb is tougher. You don’t need a physical M-Board, with the apps available, but there is something (IMO) still to be said about using analog/hardware/physical/Real equipment when boosting your jams. It’s so much more, well, what’s the word(s) …(dam!) …ahhh let’s say unsaturatedly fuller and I’ll say warmer sounding. If that even makes sense?! Hehh

Anyways, AGAIN! …You ROCKED IT!!

Read full topic

Thanks man! I think the sample set I used had some reverb on them or something, I really liked the sounds but just couldn’t clean them up more

item.title: Capzuul - industry city sleepers [DnB / Jungle]
item.dc:creator: Danbligity
item.description:
At that Tempo, The Drums were Perfect To Me!! I don’t usually make em that fast, but I Almost always have to work at 65 then speed it up when done, to get effects the way I want em. Lol Dope Track Though!! Twaz on Point to me.
